resources.string: Save your time at the ticket office
Add balance to your account in SUBWAY app to use it without need to get a ticker
A trip planner show you how to arrive your destination across metro lines
The application uses NFC technology to withdraw money from the yours balance depending on the number of stations.

string.name: forgetPasswordBackToLogin
string.u: I remember my password .. Back to login

resources.string: We send you a message, please enter the code to reset your password ....
Enter verification code if not automatically fill
Warning!! Your Balance Less Than 10 EGP\nYou cant make a trip over 16 stations
Warning!! Your Balance Less Than 7 EGP\nYou cant make a trip over 9 stations
Error!! Your Balance Less Than 5 EGP\nPlease recharge your wallet then try again
